column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Ten more people are seated. I repeat
column2: 10 more people. Over the course of the next 50 minutes
column3: we watched everyone else at the table get served before us
column4: while our server came by to see if we had even received our gyoza - cause no one told him it had been dropped off a few minutes after 9. Ramen came out at 9:45. I informed the manager of the situation as we left.
